last_episode_to_air.name: Finale Episode, To New York
last_episode_to_air.overview: Deok Mi looks at Ryan’s paintings and feels like she’s holding back his career that should be blossoming more in New York where he’s from. She’s in a dilemma as she loves her job but at the same time, she’d like to cheer for her boyfriend’s dream. What choice will Deok Mi make?

name: Her Private Life
overview: An art curator's life unravels, as she tries to keep her pastime as a die-hard K-pop fan secret from her gallery's new director.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: In the world of fandom, nothing is too much. Being a fanatic of something make our lives exciting, meaningful, and fulfilling. This fanatic romance comedy will show you what it takes to be a fanatic fan, and what it means to be a “Deokhoo.” Sung Deok Mi is one such person who takes her professional life serious, and someone who takes her private life of being a fanatic fan even more. Ryan Gold, who is a man drenched with success, enters Deok Mi’s life at the Chaeum Art Gallery as the director and slowly starts to fall for her charms. After slowly getting to know each other, Ryan learns Deok Mi is a serious fan of Cha Shi An, an idol singer, of whom she secretly runs a fan page of. And through her craze, he starts to take interest in being a fan himself and gradually delves into the life of being a fanatic fan. Watch as these two characters take the meaning of being a fan to a new level as they fall in love.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In the world of fandom, nothing is too much. Being a fanatic of something makes our lives exciting, meaningful, and fulfilling. This fanatic romance comedy will show you what it takes to be a fanatic fan, and what it means to be a “Deokhoo”, fangirl. Sung Deok Mi is one such person who takes her professional life serious, and someone who takes her private life of being a fanatic fan even more. Ryan Gold, who is a man drenched with success, enters Deok Mi’s life at the Chaeum Art Gallery as the new director and slowly starts to fall for her charms. After slowly getting to know each other, Ryan learns Deok Mi is a serious fan of Cha Shi An, an idol singer, of whom she secretly runs a fan page of. And through her craze, he starts to take interest in being a fan himself and gradually delves into the life of being a fanatic fan. Watch as these two characters take the meaning of being a fan to a new level as they fall in love.

tagline: I call it 'love' and the world calls it 'fan girl'

episodes.name: How Dare You?
episodes.overview: Art curator Sung Duk-mi is passionate about her work -- and her secret hobby. At an auction, she enters a bidding race against famous artist Ryan Gold.

episodes.name: You Are Fired
episodes.overview: When Ryan becomes her new boss, Duk-mi is concerned about the changes he brings to the museum -- and that he might recognize her from the airport.

episodes.name: A Rumor
episodes.overview: A meeting at a special collector's home leads to trouble for Duk-mi, who finds herself swept up in noisy rumors.

episodes.name: She Is My Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Ryan has an idea for a way to get Duk-mi out of the scandal, to Nam Eun-gi's displeasure. Cha Si-an has an unfortunate run-in with a fan.

episodes.name: Ryan and Deok Mi’s Relationship
episodes.overview: The museum's new intern poses a problem for Duk-mi. Si-an agrees to join an exhibition. Ryan sets out to procure a photographer's final work.

episodes.name: Do You Really Think You Are My Girlfriend?
episodes.overview: Ryan figures out Duk-mi's secret, and decides to have some fun with it. To the delight of the museum staff, Si-an comes for a visit.

episodes.name: Shi An’s Autograph Event
episodes.overview: Duk-mi's parents invite Ryan over for an impromptu dinner. Sindy and Duk-mi both win spots at Si-an's fan event.

episodes.name: The Visual Art Director
episodes.overview: To save the exhibition, Ryan and Deok Mi attempt to persuade Choi Da In, a visual art director, to work with Cha Shi An so he can participate. However, while helping to convince her, Da In finds out Ryan and Deok Mi's relationship is fake. Later, Da In tells Deok Mi that Ryan wants to end the fake relationship and that she likes him.

episodes.name: Is It Really Over?
episodes.overview: Ryan is shocked when he hears Deok Mi say that she wants to end their fake relationship. Although the words "end it" came out of her mouth, Deok Mi can't ignore the feelings she has for Ryan. At the end of finishing off an awkward day of feeling out each other's true feelings, Deok Mi can't fall asleep. When she goes online to chat, she meets "Latte" who comes knocking with a similar situation to share.

episodes.name: Ms. Sung, I Like You
episodes.overview: Ryan finally tells Deok Mi how feels about her, and asks her to be in a relationship for real. Deok Mi and Ryan spend happy days together but Eun Gi, who has no idea about their relationship, plans to confess his feeling towards Deok Mi. Meanwhile, Seon Joo gets furious after watching her husband’s show regarding fangirling.

episodes.name: Have You Ever Been Hit by Reality?
episodes.overview: "When did you find out that I was Shi An is My Life?" When Ryan confesses the fact that he knew she was Shi An is My Life all along, Deok Mi is appalled. On top of that, Eun Gi who is defending Deok Mi, confesses that he has feelings for her! The sparks of anger begin to fly for the first time as a couple, and to end their quarrel, Ryan takes Deok Mi away to somewhere unexpected. Meanwhile, another battle wages on between Seon Joo and Seung Min.

episodes.name: The Fact That I'm Your Fan Means I'm on Your Side
episodes.overview: Deok Mi can't leave her teary man alone and invites him to stay the night at her house. The lucky Lion gets to spend the whole night with Deok Mi, and Da In and Eun Gi get closer by sharing their feelings through a drunk conversation. Meanwhile, the painting by Lee Sol gets restored, and Ryan shares with Deok Mi what Lee Sol's paintings signify to him.

episodes.name: Always With You, Even When You're Alone
episodes.overview: Deok Mi and Ryan start to sum up all the clues regarding artist Lee Sol's identity. And as they get closer to the truth, Deok Mi sees how frustrated, confused, and painful it is for Ryan. She stays by his side to console him but also gives him the space he needs. Meanwhile, Shi An's mother tries to dissuade her son from going ahead with the exhibition.

episodes.name: A Star That Shines My Dark Heart
episodes.overview: Ryan finally gets to meet his biological mother. However, the 26 years of being separated don't make it easy for a passionate reunion. Moreover, the words she speaks differ from his memories, making it even harder for him to understand. It's not until he discovers the hidden truth behind her soap bubble paintings that turns him around. Meanwhile, Deok Mi prepares a special event for Ryan.

episodes.name: You Are My Home
episodes.overview: It’s Deok Mi’s birthday and Ryan makes it very special for her. When the day couldn’t get any better, Deok Mi learns the truth about the boy, Yoon Jae, and also realizes that she had been the only one who was living in the dark. When she comes around to understanding everything, she realizes how much the people around her mean to her once again.

episodes.name: Finale Episode, To New York
episodes.overview: Deok Mi looks at Ryan’s paintings and feels like she’s holding back his career that should be blossoming more in New York where he’s from. She’s in a dilemma as she loves her job but at the same time, she’d like to cheer for her boyfriend’s dream. What choice will Deok Mi make?
